data.title: Crayola Experience Easton, PA
data.meta_description: Enjoy a family fun day at Crayola Experience in Easton, PA! A perfect place for creativity, fun and family. Visit Easton Crayola Experience today!
data.text:
Discover the Magic of Color ® at Crayola Experience, Crayola’s premier, one-of-a-kind family attraction! Dozens of colorful and creative activities and a full day of fun awaits families in Easton, Pa., just a short drive away from Philadelphia and New York City. Bigger, brighter and bolder than ever, the colorful adventures of Crayola Experience help kids and adults alike explore art and technology, express their creativity and experience color in a whole new way. Plan your visit to Crayola Experience today!

"We've loved Crayola forever and this place is everything that we could have hoped for and more"

"I thought we were just going to see a video of how crayons were made, but I was pleasantly surprised when I heard that there would be live performers. Then I was absolutely blown away by the show. All of my kids were transfixed and we learned so much"

"There is always some new activity or pass perk every month - that keeps us coming back"

"The wax hands are awesome"

"We're out here for a road trip and made sure to stop here. We're having a blast"

"We love coming here as a family because there is something for everyone"
